ValidationRule.description: Ensures the related Product Rule is of type Validation, Alert or Selection when specifying either a parent or child bundle condition level.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (TEXT(SBQQ__ProductRule__r.SBQQ__Type__c) != null && TEXT(SBQQ__ProductRule__r.SBQQ__Type__c) != 'Validation' && TEXT(SBQQ__ProductRule__r.SBQQ__Type__c) != 'Alert' && TEXT(SBQQ__ProductRule__r.SBQQ__Type__c) != 'Selection') && (TEXT(SBQQ__AscendingNestedLevel__c) != null || TEXT(SBQQ__DescendingNestedLevel__c) != null)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Condition Level only supported for Validation, Alert and Selection product rules.
